review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Yesterday the step was to identify inappropriate messages and judgments you give to
            yourself. By noticing them and labeling them as inappropriate, or wrong or undermining, helps you begin to
            gain control over them and ultimately stop listening to them. This puts you on The Path. When you stop being
            distracted and overwhelmed by these messages, you can begin to notice and identify your true needs.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Take time to go inside and restore your resources. Find your rhythm to be in harmony with your body (Pillar
            #4)
step_of_the_day.content: “Don’t waste your energy. You need every bit of it for resilience and success\" Stephen Sideroff, PhDMISSING

action_step:
Take time today to engage in your relaxation/visualization exercise to be at your best when you start your
            week.
journal_entry: Write about how successful you are in your efficient use of your energy.
